page.title: 17Schooldays
page.content: Sudbury has a 3-tier system of education, First Schools (5-9);Middle (9-13);Upper(13-16 or 18). I get up at 7am and reach the bus stop at 8. I catch the All Saints bus even though I go to Uplands. This is because I moved from Acton to Walding- field but wanted to stay at Uplands.The bus drops me near Uplands. The bell goes at 8.45 to start school. Our lessons are 35 mins long with breaks for play and lunch.We finish at 3.30pm. We often have Design- Woodwork, Metal- work,Art,Cookery,Science.We will carry on with these when we move to the nearby Upper School next year.We are split into ability groups for Maths and French, but not for English and Humanities.First Years have 1 teacher for nearly every lesson,like First Schools but we have several different ones,like the Upper.DARREN CLARKE 4T.
